name: Escape! (itch) (Robbin12392)
description:
Description:

There is a fire and smoke is slowly spreading in the room. If you don't escape within 30 minutes, you will be dead!

This game for the Oculus Quest is a virtual reality escape room with all sorts of puzzles. Use your head to get to the final code and escape. Keep your stress under control while doing the puzzles. You will need math, geography, common knowledge and much more!

Good luck!

Update 1.01:
  • Made some text better to see.
  • Changed the color of some text.
  • Other bugfixes.
